all been worked shallow this means the hook passes below just the top two loops of the stitch conventional back post stitches can be used if preferred third loop only 3lo means the hook is inserted only in the third loop of the indicated stitch behind and slightly below the top two loops this is sometimes called the back bar standing stitches are used to start most rounds you can substitute a slip_stitch and the appropriate number of chain if preferred rounds finish with a slip_stitch to join feel free to use an invisible join sizes and hooks this square measures 12 in worsted and a 5 5mm hook 9 25 in dk and a 3 5 mm hook the final stitch count is 39 yarn the sample is worked in stylecraft special dk yarn a = clematis yarn b = plum yarn c = duck egg yarn d = cream yarn e = wisteria the pattern starts by making two identical heart shapes starting with a chain ring rather than a magic_ring makes a neat little feature on the heart with yarn a chain 4 slip_stitch to 1st chain to form a ring round 1 chain 1 does not count as stitch 10 single_crochet in ring join to 1st single_crochet with slip_stitch do not finish off 10 single_crochet round 2 skip single_crochet 7 double_crochet in
